title: [LFM] - Final Hour - we need Top & Jungle - Fill roles open - [ Gold ]
body:
Final Hour is looking for a capable Jungle that can shotcall, and act as the backbone of our team, someone capable of playing competitively on a team. 
We're looking for a competent, capable top laner who can play the meta, communicate properly.
---------------------------------------------------
====================||Application||==================
___________________________



IGN:
Role:
Rank:
Mic?:
Can you use voice comms (Teamspeak):
Can you listen to shotcall / make them?:
